org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc.strategy.simple

Class SimpleRiverMouth

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc.strategy.simple.SimpleRiverMouth
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RiverMouth<SimpleRiverContext>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColumnRiverMouth

    public class SimpleRiverMouth
extends Object
implements RiverMouth<SimpleRiverContext>
    Simple river mouth implementation. This implementation uses bulk processing, index name housekeeping (with replica/refresh), and metrics. It understands _version, _routing, _timestamp, _parent, and _ttl metadata.
